body.gatha1: Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
Dvādasa padāni suttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca attho ca;
body.gathalast: Taṃ viññeyyaṃ ubhayaṃ, ko attho byañjanaṃ katamaṃ.
body.gatha1: Hārā byañjanavicayo, suttassa nayā tayo ca suttattho;
Yā ceva desanā yañca, desitaṃ ubhayameva viññeyyaṃ;
